captions.en: sister and brother go home for Chinese New Year
I haven't been home for a long time

and look what we usually do

Why do you look like this?

It looks like this when it blooms

I don't know what kind of flower this is

We are going home for Chinese New Year

I'm bored to see you everyday
: go away lah don't come back
When I'm thinking of spending a week with you now
i don't want to see you

Now take our time to unpack these things
Every new year she tells me not to buy many things
But every time I go home, I see she buying
You see, she bought them all
Mom, you say you don't buy it
but you bought so many things again
good morning today is new year's eve
I'm going downstairs to help my mom

when it's New Year's Eve, I will be in the morning
my mom would always call me up at 7am to help she

take it back, i need it
you help me find it, i really need it
